description: This file contains utility functions and constants related to financial risk assessment, asset allocation, and goal surplus splitting for a streaming financial planning application. It defines allocation tables, performs risk-based allocation, and distributes surplus funds across financial goals based on priority and horizon.

methods.name: Dict[str,float] allocation_for_profile(risk_tolerance: int, horizon_years: float)
methods.description: Calculates asset allocation based on a customer's risk tolerance and investment horizon using predefined thresholds.

methods.name: Dict[str,float] split_surplus_across_goals(monthly_surplus: float, goals: List[Dict])
methods.description: Distributes a monthly surplus amount across multiple financial goals considering each goal's priority and horizon.

ctags.name: allocation_for_profile
ctags.pattern: /^def allocation_for_profile(risk_tolerance: int, horizon_years: float) -> Dict[str, float]:$/
